long_description: This instant, freeze-dried Backpacker's Pantry vegetable lasagna dinner makes 2 servings. Conveniently packaged: just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided and let stand a few minutes, then serve. Ideal for camping or backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This instant, freeze-dried Backpacker's Pantry vegetable lasagna dinner makes 2 servings.
